PHRASE.LANG: Its origins are unknown, but this two-handed sword seems to revitalize anyone who wields it. [#Legal]
Ses origines sont inconnues, mais cette épée à deux mains semble revitaliser quiconque la brandit. [#Legal]
Niemand weiß, woher dieser Zweihänder stammt, aber er scheint jeden, der ihn schwingt, neu zu beleben. [#Legal]
Le sue origini sono ignote, ma questa spada a due mani sembra rigenerare chiunque la impugni. [#Legal]
Sus orígenes se desconocen, pero esta espada de dos manos parece revitalizar a su portador. [#Legal]
Its origins are unknown, but this two-handed sword seems to revitalize anyone who wields it. [#Legal]
